ca.gedge.opgraph.nodes.general
Class MacroNode

java.lang.Object
  ca.gedge.opgraph.OpNode
      ca.gedge.opgraph.nodes.general.MacroNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
Vertex, CompositeNode, CustomProcessing, Extendable, Publishable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ForEachNode
public class MacroNode
extends OpNode
implements CompositeNode, CustomProcessing, Publishable

A node that contains a macro operation: a collection of nodes that behave as a single OpNode.

Method Detail

getSource

public File getSource()
Gets the source file for this macro.

Returns:
the source file from which this macro was constructed, or null if this macro was constructed from the same file as the root graph which contains this node.

mapInputs

protected void mapInputs(OpContext context)
Constructs a context mapping for this macro's published inputs. Inputs contained in the given context will be mapped to their appropriate node/input field in the internal graph this macro is using. The returned mapping will have the given context as the global context (i.e., the context mapped to by the null key).

Parameters:
context - the macro's local context

mapOutputs

protected void mapOutputs(OpContext context)
Maps published outputs from a given context mapping to a given context.

Parameters:
context - the context to map outputs to

operate

public void operate(OpContext context)
             throws ProcessingException
Description copied from class: OpNode
Have this node perform its operation. The given OpContext contains all inputs supplied by other nodes (if any) and can be acquired by OpContext.get(Object). If an input is optional, it is up to the implementing class to call OpContext.containsKey(Object) to see if the input was supplied. Finally, computed outputs should be placed into the given context under the appropriate OutputFields.

Specified by:
operate in class OpNode
Parameters:
context - the working context
Throws:
ProcessingException - if any errors occurred during the operation
